entry.title: Fwd: Block Size Increase Requirements
entry.summary: The email thread discusses the potential consequences of increasing the block size in Bitcoin. One member expresses concern for Chinese miners and suggests testing and telemetry in China. Another member sarcastically responds to a previous statement about excluding certain participants from mining. The conversation also delves into the idea that miners do not have an inherent right to mine if they cannot handle the job, specifically in regards to Chinese miners and their internet situation. Overall, the discussion revolves around the potential impact on miners with the proposed block size increase.
